com.electronauts.virtualrobot

Class Gyroscope

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.electronauts.virtualrobot.AbstractSensor
      • com.electronauts.virtualrobot.Gyroscope

  • public class Gyroscope
extends AbstractSensor
    The Gyroscope class is attached to a robot of type AbstractRobot and provides a way to query the robot's direction.

        public double getBaseAngle()

        the base angle

      • resetBaseAngle

        public void resetBaseAngle()
        Resets the base angle to the current orientation of the robot.
        See Also:
        setBaseAngle()

      • setBaseAngle

        public void setBaseAngle(double baseAngle)
        Sets the base angle to the specified value. This can be used to initialize the robot in a certain way or determine the orientation on the robot.
        Parameters:
        baseAngle - the new base angle
